Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at 63rd
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at 63rd due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at 63rd due to police activity.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Howard Red Line
ShortDescription: SB 147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Howard, Clark, Rogers and Howard: due to, street blockage near Howard Red Line.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Howard, Clark, Rogers and Howard: due to, street blockage near Howard Red Line.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #78 Montrose Temporary Reroute at Montrose/Marine Dr.
ShortDescription: Due to extremely heavy traffic and crowding at the beach, 78 Montrose buses will only provide service up to Montrose/Marine Dr.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Due to extremely heavy traffic and crowding at the beach, #78 Montrose buses will only provide service up to Montrose/Marine Dr.

 

Please allow extra travel time
